name: Regulation Royalty
title: Top-tier Dispute Resolution Regulations
description: In 2024, Togo achieved a remarkable score of 94.59 in the quality of regulations for dispute resolution, showcasing its robust legal framework.

name: Eco-Friendly Policies
title: Strong Environmental Sustainability Policies
description: Togo's CPIA rating for environmental sustainability policies was 4.5 in 2023, reflecting a commitment to eco-friendly governance.

name: Safety Net Shortfall
title: Limited Social Safety Net Benefits for the Poorest
description: In 2021, only 2.99% of Togo's social safety net benefits reached the poorest quintile, indicating a need for more inclusive welfare programs.

name: Gender Gap in Academia
title: Low Female Representation in Tertiary Education Staff
description: As of 2021, only 6.1% of academic staff in Togo's tertiary education institutions were female, highlighting a significant gender disparity.

name: Health Hurdles
title: Low Diarrhea Treatment Coverage for Children
description: In 2017, only 13.6% of children under five in Togo received ORS packets for diarrhea treatment, pointing to healthcare accessibility issues.

name: R&D Rarity
title: Scarcity of R&D Technicians
description: With just 3.62 technicians per million people in 2018, Togo faces challenges in bolstering its research and development sector.
